response.en:
ğŸ“‹ *House Rules*

1. No smoking indoors (RM300 penalty)
2. Quiet hours: 11 PM â€“ 9 AM
3. No outside guests in sleeping area
4. Keep common areas clean
5. No illegal substances
6. Check-out by 12:00 PM
7. Report any damage immediately
8. **Pets are not allowed** (adults-only hostel)

_Adults only hostel_

3. Tiada tetamu luar di kawasan tidur
4. Jaga kebersihan kawasan berkongsi
5. Tiada bahan terlarang
6. Daftar keluar sebelum 12:00 PM
7. Laporkan kerosakan segera
8. **Haiwan peliharaan tidak dibenarkan** (hostel dewasa sahaja)

response.en: Hello, welcome to Pelangi Capsule Hostel
response.ms: Hai, selamat datang ke Pelangi Capsule Hostel

response.en: You're welcome, have a great day
response.ms: Terima kasih, semoga hari anda baik

response.en: We offer cozy capsules, AC, and power outlets. Facilities include hot showers (toiletries provided), a shared kitchen with a water dispenser, free WiFi, and a lounge area. Laundry is available at RM5/load. Let us know if you have more questions!
response.ms: Kami menyediakan kapsul selesa  AC, dan soket pengecas. Kemudahan lain termasuk bilik mandi air panas (sabun disediakan), dapur kongsi, WiFi percuma, dan ruang legar. Dobi layan diri tersedia (RM5). Hubungi kami jika ada sebarang soalan!

response.en: Check-out is at 12:00 PM. Please settle any **bill** at the **front desk** before you leave, and return your key cards. **Payment** options: cash, card, or transfer. Late check-out is free (subject to availability) â€” let us know in advance.
response.ms: Masa keluar jam 12:00 PM. Sila selesaikan **bil** di **kaunter hadapan** sebelum keluar, dan pulangkan kad kunci. **Pembayaran**: tunai, kad, atau transfer. Late check-out percuma (bergantung ketersediaan) â€” maklumkan awal.

response.en: Yes, we offer luggage storage. Space is limited and subject to availability; you can use lockers in the common area (bring your padlock). If you need extra space after checkâ€‘out, let us know and weâ€™ll see whatâ€™s possible.
response.ms: Ya, kami ada ruang simpanan bagasi. Ruang terhad dan bergantung kepada ketersediaan. Anda boleh guna locker di kawasan umum (bawa padlock anda). Jika perlukan ruang tambahan selepas checkâ€‘out, maklumkan kami dan kami akan cuba selesaikan.

response.en: Payments can be made via DuitNow QR, Maybank online transfer (551128652007), or cash. Room rates start at RM45/night, RM267 for 7 nights, RM650 for 30 nights. A RM10 card deposit (refundable) is required for stays >7 nights, and a RM100 security deposit for longâ€‘term bookings.
response.ms: Pembayaran boleh dibuat melalui DuitNow QR, pemindahan Maybank (551128652007), atau tunai. Caj per malam bermula RM45, RM267/7 malam, RM650/30 hari. Deposit kad RM10 (terpulang) diperlukan bagi tempahan >7 malam, dan deposit keselamatan RM100 bagi tempahan jangka panjang.

response.en: Our hostel follows a few simple rules for a comfortable stay: Quiet hours 11â€¯PMâ€“9â€¯AM, no smoking indoors, no outside guests, **pets are not allowed**, keep shared spaces tidy, and report any damage immediately. Let us know if you need any clarifications!
response.ms: Kami mempunyai beberapa peraturan mudah: Waktu tenang 11 PMâ€“9 AM, tidak merokok dalam bangunan, tiada tetamu luar, **haiwan peliharaan tidak dibenarkan**, bersihkan ruang bersama, laporkan kerosakan segera. Sila maklumkan jika ada soalan!

response.en: Of course! Our housekeeping team will deliver extra towels, pillows, or blankets to your capsule. Contact our on-site staff Maya via WhatsApp at +60127088789 and let her know what you need!
response.ms: Tentu! Pasukan housekeeping kami akan hantar tuala, bantal, atau selimut tambahan ke kapsul anda. Hubungi staf kami Maya melalui WhatsApp di +60127088789 dan beritahu dia apa yang anda perlukan!

response.en: The **bathroom** and **shower** are at the **back** of our capsule area. **Toilets** and hot water are in that shared space â€” follow the corridor past the capsules. The **location** is clearly marked!
response.ms: **Bilik air** dan **pancuran mandi** berada di **belakang** kawasan kapsul kami. **Tandas** dan pancuran air panas ada di ruang kongsi itu â€” ikut koridor melepasi kapsul. **Lokasi** jelas ditandakan!

response.en: I'm sorry to hear that. We will **review** your bill and **investigate** â€” if there was an overcharge we'll discuss a **refund**. Our staff will contact you shortly. â€” Rainbow ğŸŒˆ
response.ms: Maaf mendengar itu. Kami akan **semak** bil anda dan **siasat** â€” jika ada lebihan caj kami akan bincang **refund**. Staf kami akan hubungi anda tidak lama lagi. â€” Rainbow ğŸŒˆ

Late check-out is subject to availability and may incur a charge of *RM20/hour*.

Maximum late check-out is *3:00 PM*.

Please check with our staff Maya at +60127088789 to confirm availability for your requested time. â€” Rainbow ğŸŒˆ

Daftar keluar lewat tertakluk kepada ketersediaan dan mungkin dikenakan caj *RM20/jam*.

Maksimum daftar keluar lewat ialah *3:00 PM*.

Sila hubungi staf kami Maya di +60127088789 untuk pengesahan. â€” Rainbow ğŸŒˆ

response.en:
ğŸ“¦ *Lost & Found*

We'll check our Lost and Found for your item immediately!

For urgent items like a passport or valuables, our security team will prioritize the search right away.

Options for retrieval:
â€¢ *Pickup*: Visit us at 26A Jalan Perang, Taman Pelangi
â€¢ *Shipping*: We can arrange delivery (shipping cost borne by guest)

Items are kept for *30 days*.

Please contact staff Maya at +60127088789 with details of your lost item. â€” Rainbow ğŸŒˆ

response.en: Thank you so much for your kind words! ğŸ˜Š We truly appreciate your feedback and are glad you enjoyed your stay at Pelangi Capsule. Your recommendation means a lot to us! We'd love to welcome you back anytime. â€” Rainbow ğŸŒˆ
response.ms: Terima kasih banyak atas kata-kata baik anda! ğŸ˜Š Kami sangat menghargai maklum balas anda dan gembira anda menikmati penginapan di Pelangi Capsule. Anda dialu-alukan untuk kembali bila-bila masa! â€” Rainbow ğŸŒˆ

response.en: Thank you for sharing your feedback! We truly appreciate it. If anything wasn't up to standard, we're sorry and want to make it right â€” your experience matters to us. Please don't hesitate to contact staff Maya at +60127088789 if there's anything we can do. â€” Rainbow ğŸŒˆ
response.ms: Terima kasih kerana berkongsi maklum balas anda! Kami sangat menghargai. Jika ada apa-apa yang tidak memuaskan, kami minta maaf dan ingin memperbaikinya. Hubungi staf Maya di +60127088789 jika ada apa-apa kami boleh bantu. â€” Rainbow ğŸŒˆ

response.en:
ğŸ›ï¸ *Capsule Deck Info*

Our capsule numbering works like this:
â€¢ **Even numbers** (C2, C4, C6, C12, C14...) = **Lower deck (bottom bunk)**
â€¢ **Odd numbers** (C1, C3, C5, C11, C13...) = **Upper deck (top bunk)**

For example: C5 is *upper deck* (top bunk), C4 is *lower deck* (bottom bunk).

Most guests prefer lower deck â€” we try to assign even-numbered capsules first! If you'd like a specific deck, just let us know. ğŸ˜Š

â€” Rainbow ğŸŒˆ
response.ms:
ğŸ›ï¸ *Info Dek Kapsul*

Sistem nombor kapsul kami:
â€¢ **Nombor genap** (C2, C4, C6, C12, C14...) = **Dek bawah**
â€¢ **Nombor ganjil** (C1, C3, C5, C11, C13...) = **Dek atas**

Contoh: C5 ialah *dek atas*, C4 ialah *dek bawah*.

Kebanyakan tetamu prefer dek bawah â€” kami cuba assign nombor genap dahulu! Jika anda nak dek tertentu, beritahu kami. ğŸ˜Š

â€” Rainbow ğŸŒˆ

response.en: We're sorry about the temperature issue! Each capsule has an individual fan you can adjust. If the AC is too cold or too hot, please let our staff know and we can cool or warm up the area. Contact Maya at +60127088789 for immediate help. â€” Rainbow ğŸŒˆ
response.ms: Maaf tentang masalah suhu! Setiap kapsul ada kipas individu yang boleh dilaraskan. Jika AC terlalu sejuk atau panas, maklumkan staf kami dan kami boleh laraskan. Hubungi Maya di +60127088789 untuk bantuan segera. â€” Rainbow ğŸŒˆ

response.en: I'm not sure I understand. Could you rephrase your question? You can also contact our staff directly at +60127088789 for assistance. â€” Rainbow ğŸŒˆ
response.ms: Maaf, saya tidak faham. Boleh tulis semula soalan anda? Anda juga boleh hubungi staf kami di +60127088789 untuk bantuan. â€” Rainbow ğŸŒˆ
